channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. stock futures flat following Friday’s Fed-fueled rally
item.description: U.S. stock-market futures were little changed Sunday, after stocks rallied Friday on fresh hopes of a September rate cut by the Fed.

item.title: Keurig Dr Pepper reportedly near $18 billion deal to buy coffee company JDE Peet’s
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. is closing in on a roughly $18 billion deal to acquire the Dutch coffee company JDE Peet’s NV, the Wall Street Journal reported ...

item.title: ‘I can only rely on me’: How do I protect myself from my parents’ nursing-home bills?
item.description: “I do not expect or need anything from my parents.”

item.title: ‘I learned a hard lesson’: My ex-husband gambled away our $900,000 life savings. Do I use my 401(k) to buy a home?
item.description: “I have about $80,000 in my 401(k) and $10,000 in savings.”

item.title: As a nurse, I’ve seen people use their power of attorney to take advantage of their parents. It would chill you to the bone.
item.description: “Even if someone has millions of dollars in retirement, that won’t keep them from being trapped in the hospital.”

item.title: Morgan Stanley picks this stock to play China’s emerging tourism trend
item.description: Foreign tourists are starting to visit China more, paving the way for industry revenue of at least $2 trillion over the next decade, Morgan Stanley pr...

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 dividend stocks for steady returns
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service spotlights three dividend-paying stocks, including EOG Resources and Home Depot.

item.title: Challenging Buffett: Buying wonderful companies at fair prices isn't more profitable
item.description: A Macquarie analysis showed the opposite is true: buying fair companies at a wonderful price outperforms buying wonderful companies at a fair price.

item.title: Medtronic makes two key additions to its board. How activist Elliott can build shareholder value
item.description: The stage seems to be set for a long-term mutually beneficial relationship between the parties.

item.title: Buy these outperforming stocks with room to run, says UBS
item.description: As earnings season winds down, investors should be on the lookout for some stocks that might still have room for upside, according to UBS.
